name: Attack of the Aliens (Jake Mills' Games)
name_original: Attack of the Aliens (Jake Mills' Games)
description:
The Planet is under attack! Fight off an Alien Invasion in this 3D Shooter Game! Game Info

You control the Planetary Defence Gun in an attempt to take down the Invading Alien UFOs. Destroy waves of increasingly difficult UFO attacks. Collect Health crates to stop the Gun from getting too damaged. The Mega Laser needs to be charged by destroying enemies and collecting Charge crates. Then use the Laser to take down the Mothership!

Version Info

The current version is 1.0. This is the first publicly available version and this game will not receive any further development.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Rotate Gun - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Shoot - Left Control / Left Click
  • Laser - Space
  • Zoom Out / In - Q / E
  • Pause - Escape

PS4 Controller

  • Rotate Gun - Left Joystick
  • Shoot - Square
  • Laser - Circle
  • Zoom Out / In - L2 / R2
  • Pause - Start / Options

Xbox One Controller

  • Rotate Gun - Left Joystick
  • Shoot - X
  • Laser - B
  • Zoom Out / In - LT / RT
  • Pause - Start / Options
Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just double-click the downloaded executable and it will extract the files you need. Then open up the folder and launch the Game!

Enjoy Playing!

Please feel free to leave a Rating, Comment, or even a Bug Report. Anything is greatly appreciated.
